title: ‘We are cooked’: Humanoid robots practice kung fu with monks at China’s Shaolin Temple
description: Artificial intelligence continues to evolve rapidly, with robots entering spaces once considered uniquely human. The unusual sight has left viewers both amused and unsettled.

description: Elon Musk says the most cost-effective place to run artificial intelligence won’t be on Earth but in orbit, as SpaceX and xAI plan a million-satellite network of solar-powered data centres in space.

title: Amazon Shares Dive 8% After Announcing $200 Billion AI Spending Spree
description: Amazon revealed plans Thursday to invest $200 billion in 2026 on data centers, satellites, and infrastructure as part of its aggressive push into artificial intelligence, surpassing Wall Street projections by $50 billion. Shares dropped almost eight percent in Friday morning trading.
